effect.diamond_pearl: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect.platinum: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.
short_effect.platinum: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user looses its grudge on the move last used by the foe by cutting 4 PP from it.
flavor_text.platinum: The user looses its grudge on the move last used by the foe by cutting 4 PP from it.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user looses its grudge on the move last used by the foe by cutting 4 PP from it.
